biography:
Liang Yuan, born in Beijing on November 16, 1993, graduated from the director department of the Chinese Opera Academy and actress in mainland China.

In 2013, Liang Yuan appeared in the revolutionary historical drama " Mao Zedong ", thus officially entering the entertainment circle . In 2014, he played Wang Wutong in the anti-war drama " Immediately in the World " . In 2016, starring inspirational light comedy " match point girl "  In the same year, he appeared in the spy war drama " Jinmen Flying Eagle " . In 2017, starred in the inspirational drama "The Police Dog Comes " . In August, she played the female criminal police Zhou Shutong in the suspense reasoning drama " White Night Pursuit" . In January 2018, Liang Yuan won the first Golden Jubilee Award for the Top Ten Network Star Awards
name: Yuan Liang
